status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Was able to hit the issue with the provided seed. Found that we were trying to read negative bytes off the file which caused the Exception.

Ran the patch 360 times with the provided PR and the exception no longer happens.

+1
Does this need to go to trunk?
My bad. I just read the commit history wrong.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Test fix. Have run locally over 600 times, Jon has run locally over 360 times with the given seed
